title: Power Bars
ingredients: ['300g almonds (raw)', '60g flax meal (flax seeds ground in a blender)', '50g desiccated coconut', '125g unsalted almond butter (roasted tastes better)', '½ teaspoon celtic sea salt', '½ cup coconut oil', '1 tablespoon agave nectar', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '150g dark chocolate 73% (optional)']
